TEXT.TITLE: BICC PLC <BICC.L> 1986 YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Shr 22.7p vs 20.3p. Final div 8.25p, making 11.75p vs 11p. Pre-tax profit 101 mln stg vs 92 mln. Attributable profit 45 mln vs 39 mln. Turnover 2.14 billion stg vs 2.11 billion. MORE
